title: Frequently Asked Questions
subtitle: Everything you need to know about the product and billing.
q1: Is there a free trial available?
a1: Yes, you can try us out for free for 30 days. If you wish, we will provide you with a free and personalized 30-minute onboarding call so you can get started as soon as possible.
q2: Can I change my plan later?
a2: Yes, you can change your plan as many times as you need. We have monthly and yearly plans.
a3: We have a cancellation policy up to 14 days after contracting.
a4: We operate in multiple countries, with multiple payment methods. Receive receipts and invoices for all your transactions made on the platform in your email.
q5: How do I modify my personal data?
a5: You can modify your personal data by simply clicking on your personal profile and accessing your user panel.
below-subtitle: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Please chat with our team.
